
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VPalGenerator.cpp
          VPalGenerator.h
          VPalGenerator__Syms.cpp
          VPalGenerator__Syms.h
          VPalGenerator__Trace.cpp
          VPalGenerator__Trace__Slow.cpp
  DEPENDS PalGenerator.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/PalGenerator.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VPalGenerator STATIC
    VPalGenerator.cpp
    VPalGenerator__Syms.cpp
    VPalGenerator__Trace.cpp
    VPalGenerator__Trace__Slow.cpp
    PalGenerator.v
)

target_compile_options(VPalGenerator PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VPalGenerator PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VPalGenerator verilated)
